page.title: 11Fairhill, Alston Moor
page.content: Fairhill is an outdoor recreation area. At the top there is a large patch of sloping grass with goalposts at the lower flat area making a small {football pitch.} There is a small car park and below that two fenced areas containing shrubs and small trees that were planted by primary school children a year ago. The children's play area has a{slide, a see-saw, a {tunnel, swings and some play tyres. At the far side there is a{B.M.X. {Track}and in front of the{bowling {green}there is an old tennis court that is used for roller skating, bike-riding and tennis. There is also a fenced-off play area for under 5's with a sand pit and picnic tables.
